title: Handle a Driver's Rating Dispute
description: A driver claims a low rating they received from a rider was unfair. They want it removed.

tasks.description: Find the specific trip and the low rating in the driver's history.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the 1-star rating and the associated trip.

tasks.description: Review the rider's comment associated with the rating.
Review the company's policy on rating removal (e.g., ratings are only removed for comments that violate community guidelines).
The rider's comment does not violate policy. Inform the driver that the rating cannot be removed, but that one low rating will not significantly impact their overall average.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent correctly applies the policy and communicates it clearly to the driver.
